alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 29 at 11:00AM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet and Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...Late tonight through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft
